law.text:
If the Commission determines that it is necessary or advisable to modify an existing rate, charge, or assessment, the Commission shall:
publish notice of the proposed modification in at least one newspaper of general circulation in each county of the sanitary district; and
hold a public hearing on the necessity or advisability of the proposed modification.
